name: Stunning Strike
trigger: once per turn when you hit a creature with a Monk weapon or an Unarmed Strike
effects: you can expend 1 Focus Point to force the target to make a Constitution saving throw
on a failed save, the target is Stunned until the start of your next turn
on a successful save, the target's speed is halved until the start of your next turn and the next attack roll made against the target before then has advantage
